content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern here https //theturtletrunk com/farmhouse-blanket-crochet-pattern/ the farmhouse blanket is an easy crochet blanket pattern it uses a one row repeat and features the even moss stitch fun stripes and a crab stitch border the pattern instructions are for a lapghan size 36 x 48 blanket but also includes 5 other size options and instructions on how to customize the size pattern language english pattern includes -detailed instructions for a crochet blanket -multiple size options -link to free video tutorial -gauge difficulty advanced beginner finished size 36 x 48 more sizes included supplies needed 1 634 total yards of medium 4 weight yarn 6 00mm j hook yarn needle and scissors standard us crochet terms you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern
